name: DrippyDipfromtheDeep
0:
”Alexa, open Drippy Dip”
”Alexa, ask Drippy Dip about the deep sea”
”Alexa, ask Drippy Dip about the deep ocean”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drippy dip
des:
This is an educational skill that presents interesting facts about the deep sea through the eyes of Drippy Dip - a friendly and fun deep sea creature who has come to the surface to tell us about the place she is from. She uses simple language to describe fascinating facts about deep sea exploration, some history - and mainly, the wonderful creatures that live there.

The skill has a number of facts that are presented one after the other in a random order, as long as the user continues to ask for more. Just ask Alexa to open Drippy Dip - and let Drippy introduce herself and guide you through fascinating details. 

The information will be refreshed periodically - so please do come back for new facts. 
This skill is for curious kids of all ages - who we hope can learn something new about the mysterious deep sea.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
